import React, { useContext, useEffect } from 'react'; import '../css/Navbar.css'; import { NavLink, Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import UserContext from '../utils/UserContext'; const Navbar = () => { const { currentUser, logout } = useContext(UserContext) return (
  • QuizIt
  • Home
    • {/* NOT LOGGED IN */} {!currentUser ? <>
  • Sign up
  • Log in
    • : <> {/* LEFT */}
  • Flashcards
  • Groups
  • Users
    • {/* RIGHT */}
  • {currentUser.username}
    • }
) } export default Navbar;
